faqs.question: What is Parikshe?
faqs.answer: Parikshe is a student-first e-learning platform built to support SSLC, PUC, and KCET exam preparation across Karnataka.

faqs.question: Is there doubt-solving or mentorship support available?
faqs.answer: Yes. We offer doubt-solving and mentorship. Our Premium plans include 10 am to 10 pm doubt-solving support.

faqs.question: What makes Parikshe different from tuition or coaching centers?
faqs.answer: Parikshe brings the quality and results of expert coaching to students anywhere, anytime, without the high costs of tuition.

faqs.question: Which districts and cities is Parikshe currently active in?
faqs.answer: Parikshe has a presence in 33 districts and 27 cities across Karnataka, reaching thousands of students through digital learning and field outreach.

faqs.question: Is Parikshe free for students?
faqs.answer: Parikshe provides free access for students through YouTube; some advanced features are a part of premium plans via the Parikshe app and Parikshe Website.

faqs.question: What subjects are covered in Parikshe?
faqs.answer: Parikshe covers all major subjects for SSLC, PUC (Science & Commerce), and KCET, including Physics, Chemistry, Maths, Biology, English, Kannada, Hindi, Social Science, Accountancy, Business Studies, Economics, and Computer Science.
